## Radians2DegreesNode class

Converts radians to degrees

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class Radians2DegreesNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Applies the formula: degrees = radians \* (180 / Ï€) Supports scalar and vector inputs.
